attributes.action: Give Mediawatch of Football365.com fame a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the public would like to give Mediawatch. A regular slot on the fantastic football365.com website a knighthood for serivces to comedy, football and for a bit of a laugh. Failing that would could all pitch in to try and buy one for him. Thank you all who sign this.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
